question: List price of an article at a show room is 2000 Rs. And it is being sold at successive discounts of 20% and 10% . Its net selling price will be :
explanation:
Equivalent discount for successive discounts of 20% and 10%
$latex = \\left ( 20+10-\\frac{20\\times 10}{100} \\right )\\% = 28\\%&s=1$
âˆ´ Net selling price = 72% of 2000
$latex = \\frac{72\\times 2000}{100}&s=1$ $latex = 1440 Rs.$
Hence option [B] is the right answer.
